text: Broadway Melody of 1936 is a 1935 American musical movie directed by Roy Del Ruth and starring Jack Benny, Eleanor Powell, Robert Taylor, Una Merkel, Sid Silvers, Buddy Ebsen, June Knight. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 3 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1936. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1935 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Del Ruth
title: Broadway Melody of 1936
